readable.title: 1022454332_6af2c1449a
readable.content: A child and a woman are at waters edge in a big city . a large lake with a lone duck swimming in it with several people around the edge of it . A little boy at a lake watching a duck . A young boy waves his hand at the duck in the water surrounded by a green park . Two people are at the edge of a lake , facing the water and the city skyline .
